value:
I normally prefer clothing that is easy
to move around in, but I can make an
exception to celebrate the New Year.

The history between taguel and
humans is a sad one, and yet, here
we are.$k$pWe can still come together to
celebrate the New Year and wish
for a happier future.

This New Year's dish has lots of
carrot in it. What did you say it
was called? Osechi? Hmm...

Do taguel hibernate in the winter?
At the very least, I certainly don't.
I doubt Yarne does either.

Taguel don't usually wear very thick
clothing, but Yarne doesn't look bad
in that kimono.

Don't get negligent just because it's a
holiday. That said, hereâ€”a gift for you
from $Nf.

A sign of good things to come. Still,
carelessness can ruin even the best
of starts.

There is a future where we survive.
With my allies at my side, I will fight
this year as well.

That's not good. At this rate, I won't
even survive the year...

You have my thanks. With this power,
I will cut a path through the new year.

I am Panne. I'm glad to be here
celebrating the New Year with you.

Whether it's the old year or the new,
danger is unavoidable. It creeps up
on you, waiting for a chance to strike.$k$pAs long as Yarne and I are alive, we
taguel will always be in danger. I am
prepared for that much, at least.$k$pBut...I have no intention of forcing
anyone else to make the same
commitment.$k$pEveryone here is so excited about
the new year, after all... It's probably
not what I should be dwelling on.$k$pYou don't need to worry. I am simply
enjoying the holiday in my own way.
It is a new year, after all.$k$pSo, let us struggle, fight, and
survive, so that we and all our
allies can celebrate the next one.
A new year already?
The best for a new year!
Here's your New Year's gift.
Having fun? Too bad!
Not my year, huh...
Happy New Year. That's what you say, right?
Oh, I didn't hear your footsteps. Not bad.
Is there really such a thing as a year of the rabbit? Then, wouldn't that make it our year?
You want to pet a rabbit? Does it have to be me? I got all dressed up for this!
I'd like to start the year off with lots of carrots. Can you cook something like that?
These clothes look nice, but they're a bit uncomfortable. I can't move around like I'm used to...
I hope that we will be able to enjoy this year together as well.
Right.
What's your plan?
Let's find our fortune.
